comment:
Full-time staff:Employees who work 40 hours per week and receive a fixed salary, in this case, 1280 dollars per week.
Part-time staff:Employees who work fewer hours per week, in this case, 15 hours, and receive a lower salary, in this case, 450 dollars per week.
Total staff hours:The sum of hours worked by full-time and part-time staff, which in this case needs to be 1000 hours to meet the mail delivery requirements.
